00199 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00200 |   PLT_StateVariableNameFinder
00201 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00206 class PLT_StateVariableNameFinder 
00207 {
00208 public:
00209     // methods
00210     PLT_StateVariableNameFinder(const char* name) : m_Name(name) {}
00211     virtual ~PLT_StateVariableNameFinder() {}
00212 
00213     bool operator()(const PLT_StateVariable* const & state_variable) const {
00214         return state_variable->GetName().Compare(m_Name, true) ? false : true;
00215     }
00216 
00217 private:
00218     // members
00219     NPT_String   m_Name;
00220 };
